attributes.action: Some form of Official recognition for Captain Tom Moore for his fundraising
attributes.additional_details: This man already went to give his life for the country and now he's being a true Briton raising astonishing amounts of money for the NHS in these critical times of need!
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore (age 100) has already raised over £6m for the NHS. Lets give this veteran the nations support by gaining Official recognition he truly deserves.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
